scripts.lint: pnpm --filter svelte-app lint && pnpm --filter sanity-cms lint
scripts.lint:check: pnpm --filter svelte-app lint:check && pnpm --filter sanity-cms lint:check
scripts.format: pnpm --filter svelte-app format && pnpm --filter sanity-cms format
scripts.typegen: pnpm --filter sanity-cms exec sanity schema extract --enforce-required-fields && pnpm --filter sanity-cms exec sanity typegen generate
